title: New: How To Dress Well – Ocean Floor For Everything
content:
How To Dress Well’s sophomore effort is undoubtedly one of the most hotly anticipated records of 2012 amongst the indiesphere.

With very little new material since his 2010 debut, Ocean Floor For Everything is a welcome return, and continues in his characteristic ethereal nature, awash with melancholic piano sections and reverb heavy vocals. Check it out below and grab a free download while you can.

How To Dress Well’s second LP Total Loss will see it’s release in September.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
